1864–1878

1. Allegro con moto

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 2.5

2. Allegretto espressivo

The accompaniment to Grieg’s second setting of the song The Fair-Haired Maid (Den blonde Pige) (EG 138) for voice and piano is not far from identical to this piece.

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 2.5
